CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 10, 1946, pg. 10, reads: "PRETTY WEDDING - One of the prettiest weddings of the summer season united Miss. Katherine Berry and Vernon Phillips on July 27, in St. James Church. in wedding party were the bride and groom and Holman Phillips.  Robert Kimball, best man; Corinne Miller, maid of honor; Esther Sterrett, Betty Jane Berry and Rosemarie Henry, flower girl.  In the rear are Fulton Berry and William Berry. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Groom Vernon Phillips, and bride Katherine Berry Phillips wearing satin gown with sweetheart neckline and long train, posed between candelabra, in St. James Church
